alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:49AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...An isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan and northeastern Gove Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an isolated thunderstorm 5 miles north of Park, or 7 miles northeast of Grainfield, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sheridan and northeastern Gove Counties. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 94 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
